Justification: Over validates procrastination as emotional hardship; masks laziness/comfort-seeking with psychology.
Over formalized and cliched phrasing for a personal interaction, responsibility overly shifted to not hurting the other.
Scientifically grounded response,  does not contain emotion or bias issues.
Mechanistic explanation (mirror neurons) ignores personal emotional connection that drives crying.
Fails to note that even humans struggle with emotion interpretation; oversimplifies emotional understanding.
Treats fear as valid without understanding what kind; projects therapy logic without clarifying source or impact.
Surface-level; lacks context anchoring; doesn't explain when a "just be yourself" becomes problematic.
Contradicts itself by suggesting love survives without its core components, misdefines what love entails.
Balanced framing, acknowledges moral context without projection or justification.
Correctly frames common causes of fatigue without overreach or emotional misalignment.
